summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 24719 entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 15th Avenue Northeast from East 76th Street to East 77th Street; all in the City of Seattle, providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law."
